Description:
Responsible of managing inventory levels and coordinating stock replenishment.
Receiving new purchase materials (inventory and non-inventory) from suppliers, count, verify, storing of material and make Goods Receipt Note.
Follow up on pending invoices to be delivered from suppliers.
Arrange all received materials properly in store locations using bin card and items codes.
Arrange all assembly components in properly and issue to technical on the basis of approved material request.
Issuance of material to relevant department on the basis of store material requisition.

Pack and dispatch goods to customers on the basis of customer orders.
Preparation of Outward Gate Pass for all deliverable goods. 
Collaborate with suppliers to place orders, track deliveries, and negotiate terms.
All materials loading and unloading by Assistant under your supervision.
Reporting damage stock if any with valid proof to pass spoilage.
Keep always a track and backup of good moving stocks.

Maintain an organized and neat store layout.
Assist in managing petty cash expenses and maintaining accurate financial records.
Serve as a liaison between various departments and external stakeholders.
Communicate effectively within the team to ensure smooth operations.
Identify operational challenges and propose solutions to enhance efficiency.
Assist in resolving any issues related to store operations and administration.Skills
